# Support for PEM encoded RSA keys in .NET-Framework using BouncyCastle

Generation of an RSA key pair, export and import of PEM encoded private (in PKCS#8 and PKCS#1 format) and public keys (in SPKI and PKCS#1 format), encryption/decryption and signing/verifying using the BouncyCastle classes. 

Tested with .NET Framework 4.8 and Portable.BouncyCastle 1.9.0



Sample output:

